content: VIT-AP University (VIT-AP), also known as Vellore Institute of Technology, Andhra Pradesh or VIT University, Andhra Pradesh, is a private research university located in Inavolu, Amaravati, the capital of Andhra Pradesh, India which was found on 2017 under the child university of Vellore Institute Of Technology, Vellore.

footer: Preparing students to make meaningful contributions to society as engaged citizens and leaders in a complex world

content.title: Undergraduate Education
content.desc: Rich learning experiences that provide a broad liberal arts foundation and deep subject-area expertise

content.title: Graduate Education
content.desc: Unsurpassed opportunities to participate in the advancement of entire fields of knowledge

content.title: Driving impact
content.desc: Continuing adult education, executive and professional programs, and programs for K-12 students

footer: Building a vibrant community of creative and accomplished people from around the world

content.title: Student Life
content.desc: A residential campus with diverse housing, exceptional dining, and over 600 student organizations

content.title: Arts & Culture
content.desc: A rich tradition of fostering creativity and a vibrant arts district on campus

content.title: Recreation & Wellness
content.desc: State-of-the-art facilities and fitness programs to encourage movement and play

content.title: Explore the possibilities of a VIT-AP education as you map out your college journey.
content.desc: We look for distinctive students who exhibit an abundance of energy and curiosity in their classes, activities, projects, research, and lives.

content.title: VIT-AP meets the full financial need of every admitted undergrad who qualifies for assistance.
content.desc: Nearly 80% of undergrads receive some form of financial assistance through specific scholarships, excellence awards.
